name: HideandSeek
0:
”Alexa, open hide seek”
”Alexa, start hide seek”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hide seek
des:
Play hide and seek in a completely new way with the echo buttons

Split into 2 teams. Each team receives an echo button and has to hide it. Then both teams have to search the button of the other team. The team that pushes the button of the other team first wins!

Attention: Addictive

This game is for a minimum of 2 players.
For this game 2 echo buttons are needed.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
